code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{Box,Paper,Typography,Button,Chip,Stack}from'@mui/material';import{AccessTokenInput}from'../Auth/AccessTokenInput';import{setAccessToken}from'../../store/slices/authSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Settings=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{isAuthenticated,loading}=useSelector(state=>state.auth);const token=localStorage.getItem('kite_access_token');const handleClearToken=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('kite_access_token');dispatch(setAccessToken(null));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,color:"primary",children:"Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,sx:{p:3,mb:3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Authentication Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{spacing:2,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",children:"Status:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:isAuthenticated?"Authenticated":"Not Authenticated",color:isAuthenticated?"success":"error"})]}),isAuthenticated&&token&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",gutterBottom:true,children:"Access Token:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",sx:{bgcolor:'grey.100',p:1,borderRadius:1,wordBreak:'break-all'},children:token})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",color:"error",onClick:handleClearToken,disabled:loading,children:"Clear Token"})]})]})]}),!isAuthenticated&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,sx:{p:3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Update Access Token"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccessTokenInput,{})]})]});};
